prodNameC: 協克單純疱疹病毒1型免疫球蛋白M抗體試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Component
1.Microplate wells(12 x 8)：coated with antigens: 12 microplate strips each containing 8 individual break-off wells in a frame
2.Calibrator (1 x 2.0 ml)：IgM,human
3. Positive control(1 x 2.0 ml)：IgM, human
4. Negative control(1 x 2.0 ml)：IgM, human
5. Enzyme conjugate(1 x 12 ml)： peroxidase-labelled anti-human IgM (goat)
6. Sample buffer(1 x 100 ml)： Containing IgG/RF-Absorbent (Anti-human IgG antibody preparation obtained from goat)
7. Wash buffer(1 x 100 ml)：10X concentrate
8. Chromogen/substrate solution(1 x 12 ml)：TMB/H2O2
9. Stop solution(1 x 12ml)：0.5 M sulphuric acid
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區復興南路2段157號5樓之3
efficacy: 此試劑是利用ELISA分析方法，半定量檢測人體血清或血漿HSV-1特異性醣蛋白gC1 IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3305 單純皰疹病毒血清試劑
